Thank you very much.  I found a picture of Takeda with antlers on-line too.
The only reference I can find to a Uesugi Kenshin maedate though mentions a
crescent moon.

There is a 1990 film by Kadokawa Haruki, called in English: Heaven and
Earth, originally: Ten To Chi To, which I've seen on cable, focussing on the
Takeda-Uesugi battles.
